company s dealers locations within the U S This included all detailed information of sales and budget of each product category as well as all competitors dealers locations Effectively used Hootsuite and website marketing Created a master events calendar spreadsheet with all standup paddle events worldwide for the 2014 season Company Name City Sales Representative 12 2008 to 07 2013 Effectively managed the most important accounts in Minas Gerais state and the distributor network Identified and prospected hospital accounts to execute strategic sales initiatives that resulted in exceeding the and clinical studies to effectively communicate the clinical and scientific benefits of Abbott Nutrition products to targeted healthcare professionals Organized meetings and speaker programs in order to deliver content to health care professionals in topics related to clinical nutrition products and Abbott Nutrition expertise Participated in national and regional medical conventions and exhibits
